data.comment: In the minute -5, David (Fortaleza) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
Fortaleza kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
In the minute 6, Atletico Mineiro are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 9, Fortaleza drive upfield and Ronald gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atletico Mineiro defender.
Throw-in for Fortaleza close to the penalty box.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 12, Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 18, Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fortaleza's half?
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Atletico Mineiro, close to Fortaleza's area.
In the minute 20, Atletico Mineiro's Bueno breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 23, Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Hyoran's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 25, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Keno is back on his feet again.
Savio Pereira Sampaio waits before resuming play because Keno for Atletico Mineiro is still down.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
In Fortaleza, Atletico Mineiro push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 31, Free kick Fortaleza.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 32, Felipe is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 35, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
David puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Tinga with an assist there.
In the minute 39, Felipe in Fortaleza has been yellow-carded a second time by Savio Pereira Sampaio and is being sent off.
Atletico Mineiro's Allan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
In the minute 42, Rogerio Ceni is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Castelao with Yuri Cesar replacing David.
Eduardo Sasha grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 42, Great play from Hyoran to set up the goal.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Eduardo Sasha (Atletico Mineiro) has received a yellow card from Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 45, Ronald (Fortaleza) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Castelao the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, It's Atletico Mineiro with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Atletico Mineiro in Fortaleza.
Fortaleza make their second substitution with Osvaldo replacing Romarinho.
The away team have replaced Fabio Santos with Marquinhos. This is the first substitution made today by Jorge Sampaoli.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro are coming forward and Guilherme Arana gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 51, Atletico Mineiro drives forward and Keno gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Atletico Mineiro's Marquinhos misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Fortaleza.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro needs to be cautious. Fortaleza have an attacking throw-in.
Yuri Cesar for Fortaleza gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Rever of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 60, Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a second substitution, with Marrony replacing Hyoran.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
In Fortaleza Fortaleza's Yuri Cesar is caught offside.
Gabriel Dias for Fortaleza has been booked by Savio Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 70, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 72, Atletico Mineiro's Mariano has been booked in Fortaleza.
Guga is on a sub for Mariano for Atletico Mineiro.
The home team replace Carlinhos with Bruno Melo.
In the minute 75, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 78, Eduardo Sasha gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Castelao.
In Fortaleza, Keno of Atletico Mineiro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In Fortaleza Atletico Mineiro attack through Allan. The finish is off target, however.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Atletico Mineiro have a dangerous throw-in.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 84, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Goal! Bruno Melo heads Fortaleza into a 2-1 lead.
Osvaldo instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 87, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Eduardo Sasha's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
The fourth official's board shows 7 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fortaleza's half?
Fortaleza pushes forward through Yuri Cesar, whose finish on goal is saved.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
At Estadio Castelao, Keno has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Marlon is replacing Osvaldo for the home team.
